QuestData.Title: Drake Hunt
QuestData.Description: The blues have begun to cover their drakes in mysterious runes. I must discover their significance.$b$b<Raelorasz pokes his hand with a spear and coats the tip with his blood.>$b$bTake this and use it on one of them. Wait for it to become subdued, then bring it here to me before it expires.$b$bTheir hatchlings feed around the northwest edge of the valley.
QuestData.LogDescription: Raelorasz wants you to use Raelorasz's Spear to subdue a Nexus Drake Hatchling and return it to him at the Transitus Shield.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to capture one of the Nexus Drakes?
QuestData.RewardText: The fate of these young drakes need not burden your conscience, $r. Malygos alone is accountable for this.$b$bI am working ceaselessly to discover the secrets of these runes. We shall take no more lives than we must.
